TopicTitle: I crashed by clicking a button.

Articles.Content:
Hi! I was playing KSP right now, I crashed my little science rover, so I clicked on 'Revert', but missed the 'Hangar' button so I went back to the runway.

Right after it loaded, I pressed Esc > Revert > Hangar. 

Poof! No more KSP! Only a small error window telling me where the log was and that I should give it to the devs. So here is my crash folder: [http://we.tl/zYYwTTiNIr](http://we.tl/zYYwTTiNIr)

-Sorry for bad english

This is a bit of an old issue I think. It happens if you are quick on the revert button right as the physics is loading up. I doubt this one will ever get fixed. However, if you wait a couple more seconds, it should bE fine to revert.

Cheers,

-Claw
